trends: There have been no other sightings in mottvile
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsMe my mom and my Boyfriend were on our way home from the movies we were talking about it my mom says whats that we were driving and there were lights it looked like lights on top of one of those cell towers thats how close and low it was, we all are like freaking out... mom pulls off the road it had not moved till we stoped and got out of the car then it started moving away pretty fast tried to take a picture we couldnt see the object it was dark out but the lights where big it was pretty close. lights where in a triangle shape. we got home like 5 mins after that looked in the sky and there is so many jets in the sky like we've never seen before iv smoked about ten cigarettes since then we are all extremely excited about this it was so close to us we each drew a picture of what we seen and its the same for all of us moms calling everyone about it hoping we see some pics or vids of it soon online other people had to of seen it to
